title: PAZERA MKV TO AVI CONVERTER
description:
I had three mkv files I downloaded from TPB, 

I always convert to avi, the first converted OK

with my usual converter program (any video)

but the last two didn't, one stopped at the beginning 

and the second at 21 minutes from the beginning.
 


I tried several mkv to avi programs but they all 

failed in the same way.



So I tried this one and although quite slow, it did 

the job !!!   Maybe that was the reason it worked, 

the others being too fast and stopped at the first 

sign of lack of continuity or glitch.




I am sharing it in case you also need it when you 

change from the pesky mkvs to the more common 

XVID avis I prefer.



I can seed only for a short time, please seed to keep 

it alive. Thank you.
